title: Any way to see full Store purchase history?
body:
I was wondering if it is possible to see everything i ever purchased from the store. 
The in game purchase history only shows a few months back.

Thanks,

replies.body: It's possible to view your full purchase history through the [Privacy Page](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/stage2); however, it will require some legwork and small fee to get those details over to you.  Hope that helps!
Only problem is that you need to know the first 5 champs you bought any many other things if you want to get a reply to your letter...

Thanks Porocles,
I don't really want to pay a fee (I'm not that determined to know my purchase history), but its great to know that something like this exists for future use. Thank you for the response!

- Sub
